abstract: Mike Hale reviews HBO program Vice Special Report: Killing Cancer.
lead_paragraph: The topic on “Vice Special Report: Killing Cancer” is less sexy and more universal than the “Vice” norm, and the approach is straightforward and relatively calm.

headline.main: Enlisting Viruses as Commandos in a War on Cancer
headline.print_headline: Enlisting Viruses as Commandos in a War on Cancer
